codeSystems.name: SNOMED_CT
codeSystems.title: SNOMED CT (all versions)
codeSystems.description: SNOMED CT is the most comprehensive and precise clinical health terminology product in the world, owned and distributed around the world by The International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO).

codeSystems.name: SubstanceAdminSubstitution
codeSystems.title: Substance Admin Substitution
codeSystems.description: Identifies what sort of change is permitted or has occurred between the therapy that was ordered and the therapy that was/will be provided.

codeSystems.name: EdqmStandardTerms
codeSystems.title: EDQM - Standard Terms
codeSystems.description: EDQM - Standard Terms used in Switzerland (aggregations of codes of ValueSets Route of Administration, Dose Form and Administration Method, see original codes system defined in https://standardterms.edqm.eu/#)
